mapper.select: SELECT kf.fullname,c.id AS id,c.capital AS capital,c.company_type AS companyType,c.credit AS credit,c.email AS email,c.info AS info,c.officer_net AS officerNet,c.organ AS organ,c.phone AS phone,c.registration AS registration, c.registration_number AS registrationNumber,c.site AS site,c.STATUS AS STATUS FROM t_cooperatives c left join kf_area kf on c.city=kf.id where c.status=0 GROUP BY c.id LIMIT #{start},#{rows}
mapper.update: update t_cooperatives set status=1 where id=#{id}
